QuestData.Title: Loaded for Bear
QuestData.Description: <This glittering cannonball stands out from the others. You notice the familiar sheen of Azerite across the surface.$B$BYou can't help but notice the nearby cannon, conveniently pointed at the ships loaded with stores of Ashvane Company weapons.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Ashvane Cannon to destroy $1oa Ashvane Co. Supplies. Azerite Cannonballs are required to fire the cannon.
QuestData.RewardText: <Better to destroy these new weapons than to let them fall into the wrong hands.>
